name: Kunal Kushwaha
tagline: CNCF Ambassador, GitHub Star, and founder of WeMakeDevs teaching millions to code
bio: Kunal Kushwaha is a Senior Developer Advocate at CAST AI and founder of WeMakeDevs. A CNCF Ambassador, GitHub Star, and TEDx speaker with 965K+ YouTube subscribers, he's passionate about open source, cloud-native technologies, and helping developers grow through comprehensive bootcamps and community initiatives.
